name: Home Sick
description:
A home is a person's most important possession, so when it is lost you, there is only one thing you can do. Re-build!

Controls:

WSAD - move about and jump

Space - "glue" together touching objects under mouse or being dragged

E -"unglue" the object under the mouse from anything it is glued to do

Walk to the left to find the map for more resources.

Made for Global Game Jam 2019 at Birmingham City University by 

Callum Masterton

Harry Collision

Benjamin Newey

Nikita Hughes

Robert Godsmark

Thomas Kiley
